TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XpsWritingProgressChangeLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the scope of a writing progress indicator for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks These values are primarily used for the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationProgressChangedEventArgs> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsWritingProgressChangeLevel FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress = int32(1)

Docs.summary: An entire sequence of one or more documents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsWritingProgressChangeLevel FixedDocumentWritingProgress = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsWritingProgressChangeLevel FixedPageWritingProgress = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsWritingProgressChangeLevel None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: There is no interpretation for the progress value.
